content: these leafy lacy fingerless mitts are great for spring they re a quick knit and great for using up leftover partial skeins they were designed to match the maridal /patterns/library/maridal shawl and feature a central leaf motif framed by cables the pattern assumes that you have experience knitting lace and cables working in the round and reading charts if you like this pattern check out myraløkka fingerless mitts /patterns/library/myralkka-fingerless-mitts and brenna fingerless mitts /patterns/library/brenna-fingerless-mitts too
